message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair, right?
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the diminishing value of the money for you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better share than 40%. How about 55/45?  Let's find a way to make this work.
My offer from round 2 still stands.  60/40 is the fairest split, considering the inflation rate.  I'm happy to negotiate further, but I won't go lower than 60%.
